$schema.description: Path to the schema for the document

root.description: Root directory containing the scene file and its resources

file.description: Path to the scene file itself relative to the root

performance level.description: Index to select the appropriate set of predefined scene settings (e.g. cubemap resolution) for the system

network.description: Settings specific to networking and servers

username.description: Username to be displayed when connected to a server

servers.description: Servers that are displayed on the server list ready to be connected to

port.description: Port to connect to. Ideally pick from https://www.iana.org/assignments/service-names-port-numbers/service-names-port-numbers.xhtml

default server.description: Index of the server to connect to upon opening demo-cube (optional)
